alert.note: Alert for Brown; Edmunds; Faulk; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:06AM MDT until June 14 at 3:45AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Edmunds County in north central South Dakota... Southwestern Brown County in northeastern South Dakota... Faulk County in north central South Dakota... Northwestern Spink County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 406 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Loyalton to near Miranda, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Pembrook Colony, Mina and Mina Lake Rec Area. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
